Class NotificationRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.Repository<Notification>
repository.notification.NotificationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<Notification>, Iterable<Notification>
public class NotificationRepository extends Repository<Notification>
Repository class for managing notifications. This class provides functionality to load, save, and manage notifications from a CSV file.
